subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Another chapter in the legend of Jeremy Lin was written on Tuesday night with a dramatic game-winning 3-pointer against the Raptors that brought the Knicks to a 6-game winning streak.
snippet: Another chapter in the legend of Jeremy Lin was written on Tuesday night with a dramatic game-winning 3-pointer against the Raptors that brought the Knicks to a 6-game winning streak.
